title: Recited a verse incorrectly for many years, what to do now? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: i have shihab from bangladesh today i found out that i memorized one verse of the quran wrongly and played many salah with that what should i do now okay the answer is that there is nothing for you to do allah azzawajal said at the end of surah hold us accountable if we were to forget or to make an error and you made an error there is nothing wrong uh on you insha allahu azam taymur from the uk
